dmca.title: [ThePlanetAbuse-C3749757E] Illegal Files on your servers
dmca.body:
To Whom It May Concern:

Please note that below-referenced copyright infringement notice does not
substantially comply with the required notification elements of the
Digital Millennium Copyright Act of 1998 ("DMCA").

Please note that we have not passed on the substantive merits of your
claim.

Please visit our web site at
www.theplanet.com/about_us/legal_docs/ThePlanet%20Copyright%20Infringeme
nt%2001%2015%2007%20FINAL.pdf
 
Legal Response Team
THEPLANET.COM INTERNET SERVICES, INC.

-----Original Message-----
From: abuse@theplanet.com [mailto:abuse@theplanet.com] 
Sent: Wednesday, April 04, 2007 9:56 PM
To: DMCA
Subject: [ThePlanetAbuse-C3749757E] Illegal Files on your servers

==== Forwarded Ticket ====
1. Illegal Files on your servers

MIME element (text/plain) 
Dear Sir or Madam, 
 
your Client Mr. Tom Peters, registrar of the domain gayporner.com which
is hosted on one of your servers is using copyrighted material illegaly.

 
He uses photographys of Mr. Sandro Bross. 
 
We wrote him an e-mail but he could not receive it cause is mailbox at
tom.peters@gayporner.com was full. 
 
We want you to clear this problems and we expect you to give us an
answer to the illegal used files, and we want you to make them not
reachable online. 
 
We hope you can help us in this case. 
If we don't get any reply and / or the files are rechable online till
the 14.04.2007 we will contact our layers and file a suit. 
 
We hope to hear soon from you. 
 
Yours sincerly 
 
M Online Systems for Mr. Sandro Bross 
 
Below you find the text we send to your client: 
 
Mail to Mr. Tom Peters, Registrar or gayporner.com and to Mr. Jacob
Randall, Registrar of nakedarena.com 
Copy to Mr. Dalibor Milosevic, Registrar of outlinepress.com 
 
Dear Sirs, 
 
we become knowen, that you use photographys of Mr. Sandro Bross for your
websites. The Photos are for example the following: 
http://nakedarena.com/gp002/7.jpg 
http://www.outlinepress.com/gbeef00/100000-082/1.jpg 
http://www.outlinepress.com/gbeef00/100000-082/7.jpg 
 
These pictures are viewable online through the sites: 
http://www.outlinepress.com/gbeef00/100000-082/ 
http://nakedarena.com/gp002/ 
 
There are also more photos of Mr Sandro Bross on your websites. 
 
We declare, that all photographys of Mr. Sandro Bross go under the
copyright and under swiss and german Urheberrecht. 
We declare that you are not allowed to use any of this photographys for
your website or anything else. 
 
We request you to delete this files on your webservers and that you will
not use any of theme any more in any way. 
 
We want to tell you that we have the adresses and ContactInformations
for all three people. 
 
If we don't get an responds to this mail and / or the files are also
available online at the 14. April 2007 we will start to file a suit
against you. 
 
Yours sincerly 
 
M Online Systems for Mr. Sandro Bross 
 
--  
"Feel free" - 10 GB Mailbox, 100 FreeSMS/Monat ... 
Jetzt GMX TopMail testen: http://www.gmx.net/de/go/topmail
